name: Project Runway 3D
description:
Hey girl, it's showtime!!
You are choosing the most appropriate outfits for the show!
Your goal is to rock the catwalk like a queen. Choose your most appropriate outfit from 3 pieces of the fork road, for the runway in order to win the higher like!
If you want to walk like a QUEEN, always choose the most appropriate attire! The better the outfit, the higher the scores—you'll be chic and unbeatable!
-Unique clothing!
-Fashion Hairstyling!
-Exquisite accessories!
-Step up your style!
-Dress up, glam up, and show them that you are a FASHIONISTA!
